items.name: Asaba Fun City Park
items.short_description: A vibrant theme park with rides, games, and entertainment for children of all ages, featuring a mix of modern and classic attractions.
items.address: Okpanam Road, Beside Delta State University, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Delta Kiddie World
items.short_description: Specially designed for younger children, this park offers gentle rides, soft play areas, and engaging activities in a safe environment.
items.address: Summit Road, GRA, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Joyland Adventure Land
items.short_description: An adventurous theme park featuring obstacle courses, climbing walls, and interactive zones, perfect for active kids and thrill-seekers.
items.address: DLA Road, Opposite NTA Asaba, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Sunshine Wonderland Asaba
items.short_description: A magical place filled with colourful attractions, character meet-and-greets, and gentle rides for a truly enchanting experience.
items.address: Nnebisi Road, Near Government House, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Asaba Dino Discovery Park
items.short_description: Step back in time at this educational park featuring life-sized dinosaur models, fossil exhibits, and interactive paleontological digs.
items.address: Mariam Babangida Way, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Prehistoric Jungle Asaba
items.short_description: Walk through a lush jungle path inhabited by animatronic dinosaurs that move and roar, offering an immersive prehistoric experience.
items.address: Asaba-Illah Road, Opp. Federal Medical Centre, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Raptor Ridge Dinosaur Sanctuary
items.short_description: A thrilling park where visitors can encounter fast and agile animatronic raptors in a simulated natural habitat, complete with interactive shows.
items.address: Dennis Osadebay Way, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Jurassic Creek Park
items.short_description: Explore winding trails and discover massive, realistic dinosaur figures hidden among the natural landscape, offering photo opportunities and information.
items.address: Behind Cenotaph, Nnebisi Road, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Grand Delta Playzone
items.short_description: Asaba's largest outdoor playground, featuring extensive climbing structures, slides, swings, and dedicated areas for different age groups.
items.address: Ibusa Road, Adjacent to Delta Mall, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Asaba Adventure Quest Park
items.short_description: An exciting adventure park with challenging obstacle courses, zip lines, and a low ropes course, perfect for building confidence and skills.
items.address: Government House Annex Road, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Emerald Kids' Hub Asaba
items.short_description: A versatile indoor-outdoor playground offering soft play, ball pits, trampolines, and a creative zone for all-weather fun.
items.address: Koka Junction, Asaba-Onitsha Expressway, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Skybound Playground & Treetop Walk
items.short_description: Experience nature from above with treetop walks, suspended bridges, and elevated play structures, offering a unique perspective and adventure.
items.address: Opposite Federal Secretariat, Okpanam Road, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Asaba Ocean Wonders Aquarium
items.short_description: Discover diverse marine life from across the globe, including colorful fish, captivating sharks, and interactive touch pools.
items.address: Along Nnebisi Road, Near Airport Road Junction, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Niger River Aquarium
items.short_description: Dedicated to the aquatic biodiversity of the Niger Delta, showcasing local fish species, reptiles, and the importance of freshwater conservation.
items.address: Koka Junction, Asaba-Onitsha Expressway, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Delta Deep Sea Exhibit
items.short_description: A specialized exhibit focusing on mysterious deep-sea creatures and their unique adaptations, with stunning visual displays and educational talks.
items.address: Anwai Road, Near Delta State Government House, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: AquaVista Asaba
items.short_description: An interactive aquarium experience featuring virtual reality tours of coral reefs, hands-on activities, and a vibrant collection of tropical fish.
items.address: Ezenei Avenue, GRA, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Asaba Fables Garden
items.short_description: Explore a whimsical garden where popular Nigerian folk tales come to life through interactive displays, sculptures, and live storytelling sessions.
items.address: Nnebisi Road, By Cable Point, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Enchanted Delta Forest
items.short_description: A magical forest where children can follow themed paths, meet fantasy characters, and participate in immersive quests based on popular fairy tales.
items.address: Asaba-Illah Road, Near Naval Base, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Whispering Woods Tales Park
items.short_description: An outdoor park designed for imagination, with themed zones where children can create their own stories and listen to classic narratives under ancient trees.
items.address: DLA Road, By Junior Staff Quarters, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Mythic Meadows Asaba
items.short_description: A unique park where children delve into world mythology and legends, with interactive exhibits depicting gods, heroes, and mythical creatures.
items.address: Federal Secretariat Road, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Asaba Discovery Lab
items.short_description: A hands-on science center where children can explore physics, chemistry, and biology through interactive exhibits and experiments.
items.address: Okpanam Road, Near Admiralty University, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Delta Tech Exploratorium
items.short_description: Focusing on technology and innovation, this center features robotics workshops, coding labs, and virtual reality experiences for young tech enthusiasts.
items.address: Summit Road, By Immigration Office, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Curiosity Corner Asaba
items.short_description: Designed for preschoolers and early elementary children, offering engaging exhibits that introduce basic scientific concepts through play.
items.address: Nnebisi Road, Opposite Shoprite, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Asaba Innovation Hub for Kids
items.short_description: A dynamic center encouraging creativity and critical thinking through engineering challenges, design studios, and renewable energy displays.
items.address: DLA Road, By Immigration Office, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Asaba Splash Lagoon
items.short_description: The largest water park in Asaba, featuring thrilling slides, a large wave pool, and extensive splash pads for all ages.
items.address: Asaba-Illah Road, Beside Admiralty University, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Kiddie Falls Water Park
items.short_description: A vibrant water park specifically designed for young children, offering shallow pools, gentle slides, and interactive water play structures.
items.address: Nnebisi Road, Near Legislative Quarters, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Aqua Oasis Asaba
items.short_description: Relax and play at this water park featuring a lazy river, smaller slides, and shaded areas, perfect for a refreshing day out.
items.address: Okpanam Road, By Housing Estate, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Delta River Rapids Water Park
items.short_description: For older kids seeking adventure, this park offers fast-paced river rides, tube slides, and a challenging water obstacle course.
items.address: Dennis Osadebay Way, Near Asaba Sports Complex, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Asaba Wildlife Park
items.short_description: Home to a variety of native Nigerian animals and some exotic species, promoting conservation and animal education.
items.address: Asaba-Illah Road, Near Naval Base, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Delta Petting Farm & Gardens
items.short_description: An interactive farm where children can meet, feed, and learn about friendly farm animals, alongside beautiful gardens.
items.address: Koka Junction, Behind Asaba Mall, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Jungle Friends Mini Zoo
items.short_description: A compact zoo focused on smaller, exotic animals, offering up-close encounters and educational programs about their habitats.
items.address: DLA Road, Near Power Line, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Mini Safari Asaba
items.short_description: Experience a walk-through mini-safari showcasing a curated selection of African wildlife in spacious, naturalistic enclosures.
items.address: Off Nnebisi Road, Near Delta State Civil Service Commission, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Asaba Young Explorers Museum
items.short_description: An interactive museum designed for children to learn through play, covering topics from local history to global cultures.
items.address: Government House Annex Road, GRA, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Future Leaders Museum Asaba
items.short_description: Inspiring children through exhibits on community roles, career paths, and leadership skills, encouraging them to envision their future.
items.address: Dennis Osadebay Way, Opposite State House of Assembly, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Delta Heritage Kids' Museum
items.short_description: Dedicated to the rich cultural heritage of the Delta region, with hands-on exhibits showcasing traditions, arts, and history for young minds.
items.address: Mariam Babangida Way, Near Delta State Library, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Creative Minds Museum Asaba
items.short_description: A vibrant space where children can unleash their creativity through art workshops, music zones, and innovative design challenges.
items.address: Okpanam Road, By Police Headquarters, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Asaba Bricktopia: The Lego Zone
items.short_description: A paradise for Lego fans, featuring massive builds, free-play brick pits, and creative construction challenges for all ages.
items.address: Ibusa Road, Behind Delta Mall, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Delta Construct-It Land
items.short_description: An expansive construction park offering large-scale building blocks, sandpits with diggers, and various tools for hands-on engineering fun.
items.address: Asaba-Illah Road, By Summit Junction, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Tiny Builders Workshop Asaba
items.short_description: A safe and stimulating environment for toddlers and preschoolers to engage with oversized soft blocks, magnetic tiles, and simple construction toys.
items.address: Ezenei Avenue, Near Federal Secretariat, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Mega Block Mania Asaba
items.short_description: Experience the thrill of building colossal structures with giant interlocking blocks, fostering teamwork and imaginative play.
items.address: Nnebisi Road, Near Legislative Quarters, Asaba, Delta State
